United States Ambassador at Large for Arctic Affairs Act of 2017
To amend the State Department Basic Authorities Act of 1956 to establish a United States Ambassador at Large for Arctic Affairs, and for other purposes.
United States Ambassador at Large for Arctic Affairs Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary:
United States Ambassador at Large for Arctic Affairs Act of 2017
Amends the State Department Basic Authorities Act of 1956 to establish within the Department of State an Ambassador at Large for Arctic Affairs.
